item.title: Serial EEPROM Writer
item.description: Remote Plug Tracing and Control System Project Since It was my Bachelor dissertion which can measure plug current (for estimate your electrcity bill) and control. I used to tell another post with details. The program is written for my undergraduate thesis. Works with ESP82266. It makes a wifi call and you can enters the password and saves wifi information to the device’s eeprom via usb. Developed with C #.
